attributes.action: help disabled children's parents to help with the cost of living
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: hi i think the goverment should cover the cost of things that are needed for the disabled my brother turned 18 in september and my parents do not work as the care for arron 24/7 where they live they have to have oil heating which is not possible for them to find the money please help them now its winter time as they can not afford to pay the monthly instalments and the need heating for aaron as he does not understand and he strips his clothes of and now is winter time we need help to fund the heating.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
